cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
project(build)
include(../../../utils/cmake/file.cmake)
find_package(SFML 2.6.1 COMPONENTS system window graphics audio)

if(NOT SFML_FOUND)
    include(FetchContent)
    FetchContent_Declare(SFML GIT_REPOSITORY "https://github.com/SFML/SFML" GIT_TAG 2.6.1)
    message(STATUS "Fetching SFML...")
    FetchContent_MakeAvailable(SFML)
else ()
    message(STATUS "SFML 2.6.1 is already installed.")
    create_json_file("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/info.json" "true" "2.6.2")
endif()
